src_original: buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca dehi me śaraṇatrayam
trir uccārya ca tān śiṣyān jñātvā sadbhaktivatsalān /  pradhānaṃ śiṣyam ekaṃ tu kṛtvā brūyād idaṃ vacaḥ // 191
ehi vatsa mahāyānaṃ mantracaryānayaṃ vidhim /  deśayiṣyāmi te samyak bhājanas tvaṃ mahānaye // 192
mantraprayogam atulaṃ yena bhagnaṃ mahābalam /  mārasainyaṃ mahāghoraṃ sākyasiṃhādibhir varaiḥ // 194
sarvajñānāṃ kadā loke sambhavo jāyate na vā /
tena yūyaṃ mahāyāne śvo jātā hi bhaviṣyatha // 209
